name: ethperf
short_description:
To develop opensource tools to implement OAM performance testing using ITU-T standards.

- Y.1731 is a super set of IEEE 802.1ag which has connectivity/fault tests plus performance, such as Delay, Delay variation and Packet loss.
Details: http://www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-Y.1731/en

- Y.1564 are more specific for testing traffic profiles and QoS policies over a specific committed traffic, which is used during activation of the service.
Details: http://www.itu.int/rec/T-REC-Y.1564/en
summary: Y.1731 & Y.1564 Layer 2 OAM Performance tools
